item.description:
Recess for Justice is going down at the Stonybrook court right off Lamartine Street in JP. (Exit Stonybrook T station on the Orange line, walk directly across the street to the park - we'll be on the field and in the courts right in front of you.)

We'll be prepared for spontaneous basketball, 4-square, badminton, and frisbee (or whatever other outdoors game you bring).




So look no further if you're seeking like-minded progressives to hang out with in Boston, want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while perfecting your frisbee forehand, or are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in. If you're interested in building cross-issue coalitions courtside...even better!

At Socializing for Justice (SoJust) events you can hang out with friends, make new ones, find a date, get the scoop on a job, and find out what's going on this weekend - political or social. And the best part is that SoJust members share your vision of building a more just world.

Wanna know more about SoJust? Check out our Frequently Asked Questions and learn about our Suggested Annual Membership Fee.
item.name: Recess for Justice
